description: Chroma Vector Store with search capabilities

collection_name.info: The name of the Chroma collection

persist_directory.info: Directory to persist the Chroma database

chroma_server_cors_allow_origins.info: CORS allow origins for the Chroma server

chroma_server_host.info: Host address for the Chroma server

chroma_server_http_port.info: HTTP port for the Chroma server

chroma_server_grpc_port.info: gRPC port for the Chroma server

chroma_server_ssl_enabled.info: Enable SSL for the Chroma server

allow_duplicates.info: If false, will not add documents that are already in the Vector Store.

search_type.info: Search type to use (Similarity or MMR)

limit.info: Limit the number of records to compare when Allow Duplicates is False.

success.store_created: Chroma vector store created successfully for collection '{collection}'

warnings.filter_not_available: Warning: Could not import filter_complex_metadata. Adding documents without filtering.

errors.chroma_not_installed: Could not import Chroma integration package. Please install it with `pip install langchain-chroma`.
errors.store_creation_failed: Failed to create Chroma vector store: {error}
errors.invalid_input_type: Vector Store Inputs must be Data objects.

logs.server_client_created: Chroma server client created - HTTP Port: {http_port}, gRPC Port: {grpc_port}, SSL: {ssl}
logs.duplicates_allowed: Duplicates allowed - will add all documents
logs.adding_documents: Adding {count} documents to the Vector Store.
logs.adding_documents_to_store: Adding {count} documents to Chroma vector store
logs.documents_added_successfully: Successfully added {count} documents with metadata filtering
logs.documents_added_without_filter: Successfully added {count} documents without metadata filtering
logs.no_documents: No documents to add to the Vector Store.
logs.no_documents_to_add: No documents to add after duplicate check
